      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(Subscription sub)
               throws IllegalArgumentException,
                      EventingException
        Creates a subscription for this callback url Success will auto populate the id, createDate, principalId properties.
        Parameters:
        sub - The message attributes to subscribe
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when parameters are invalid
        EventingException - Thrown when operation fails

      • unsubscribe

        public void unsubscribe(String subscriptionId)
                 throws IllegalArgumentException,
                        EventingException
        Deletes the provided subscription
        Parameters:
        subscriptionId - ID of subscription to be deleted
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when parameters are invalid
        EventingException - Thrown when operation fails

      • verifyAuthenticity

        public void verifyAuthenticity(Delivery delivery)
                        throws IllegalArgumentException,
                               EventingException
        Verifies the received message was delivered by LearningStudio Eventing. Eventing signs each message delivery with the subscriber's secret, so re-sign the message and compare the authorization parameter.
        Parameters:
        delivery - The contents of a delivered message
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when parameters are invalid
        EventingException - Thrown when verification fails
